titleStmt.title: London's anniversary festival, performed on Monday, October the 29th. 1688 For the entertainment of the right Honourable, Sr. John Chapman, Kt. Lord Mayor of the City of London; being their great year of jubilee. With a panegyrick upon the restoring of the charter. And a sonnet provided for the entertainment of the King. By M. Taubman. Printed and published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Taubman, Matthew, d. 1690?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Fleming, and sold by the booksellers,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
